summary: This patch for Convenient Horses simply replaces all of the medium and long whistle sounds for the Horse Whistle power with the short whistle sounds.  Basically, if the medium or long whistles bother you, then you should use this patch.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i]Convenient Horses - Only Short Whistles [/i]- By EliteKhajiit
[/b][i]

Description
[/i]-----------------------------

This patch for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14950/?]Convenient Horses[/url] simply replaces all of the medium and long whistle sounds for the Horse Whistle power with the short whistle sounds.  Basically, if the medium or long whistles bother you, then you should use this patch.

[i]
Installation
[/i]-----------------------------

Just install it with your mod manager, or extract the contents into your [i]skyrim\data[/i] folder.  Make sure it is after the Convenient Horses esp in your load order.  If you are using the non-bsa version and Mod Organizer, then just make sure you install this after Convenient Horses.


[i]Uninstall
-----------------------------

[/i]Uncheck the esp.  If you are using the non-bsa version, delete the files at [i]skyrim\data\sound\fx\ch\[/i].  



[i]My Other Mods
[/i]-----------------------------

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56490/?]Quieter Bears[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56491/?]Dwemer Clutter into Dwarven Ingots[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56550/?]Collars into Ebony Ingots[/url]
author: EliteKhajiit
